## Blue Hour Tips

The Blue Hour is the period of the day before or after sunset when the sky is still blue. Usually it lasts about 30 minutes.

<img src="photography/20180711-P7117094.jpg" style="width:100%; border:0px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="center">
Blue Hour at Marina Bay, Singapore

* [https://www.bluehoursite.com/](https://www.bluehoursite.com/) is very helpful in determining when the Blue Hour happens at your location.

* Camera Settings: Aperature priority (A) with f4.5 or higher, ISO 200+, Manual focus (MF) and 2 sec. timer with Anti-Shock activated
